name: Voice Idol Maniacs: Pool Bar Story
overview: Play 6 different pool games with 8 seiyuu using the system of DATA EAST's Side Pocket 2(Minnesota Fats - Pool Legend in NA release) your opponent include: Nishihara Kumiko(Iris Chateaubriand in Sakura Taisen) Fukami Rika(Aino Minako/Sailor Venus in Sailor Moon) Shinohara Emi(Kino Makoto/Sailor Jupiter in Sailor Moon) Nishimura Chinami(Neko Musume in GeGeGe no Kitaro) Takada Yumi(Masaki Aeka Jurai in Tenchi Muyo!) Ikezawa Haruna(Seiba Go in Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!) Kingetsu Mami(Fujisaki Shiori in Tokimeki Memorial) Shishido Rumi(Kouda Mikako in Gokinjo Monogatari)
